name: Snowy Snatch
description:
Let's go! Story

We found an old ruin with an alluring magic gem treasure in it!

Sooo sparkly! ... Let's snatch it!

There is a bit of a challenge though, since there is still a security golem active in this ruin. We'll have to be fast to avoid it!

Gameplay

Play with keyboard. Go left, go right or jump to avoid all obstacles.

(Note: supports both WSDA, ZQSD or arrow keys. Jump with either Space, Z, W or arrow up)

Credits

Made solo by me in 48 hours (including all art, animations and programming)
